p: Oral administration of ME of cyclosporine A resulted in increased bioavailability with not many side effects in hepatic impaired patients [ 86] and stable plasma drug concentrations were maintained in renal impaired patients [ 87]. Oral application of carvedilol loaded NEs has displayed two-fold faster release profile and several folds increase in C max and AUC [ 88]. Thus the particulate emulsified systems are proven to be superior in the treatment of certain ailments though they were orally administered.
